channel.title: First Auxy track on the radio? Please vote for my song :D
channel.description:
Hey guys! I am so happy that one of our national radio station in Sweden took my song in for voting to be played on radio over the next week. I am not sure, but could that be the first Auxy track to be played on radio? I am sorry if I have missed you other guys’s tracks if this has happened before.
If you want to take a second I would be thrilled to get a vote or two :smile:
Here: http://p3osignat.sverigesradio.se/submission/10614716
Just click on the heart, and use one of the ways to log in (google, twitter etc) - it only takes a second!
Woo, I an so psyched, hope I get played :smiley: Thanks guys!

item.title: First Auxy track on the radio? Please vote for my song :D
